NAME: Name
SIGNED_UP_PREFIX: Sign up for a free account below or
UNIQUE_AVATAR: This avatar is unique. You cannot change it later.
BACKUP_PHRASE: You must save the mneumonic seed. It is the only one way to recover access
SAVE_PHRASE_TEXT: Your aero depend only on you, so you'll need to save this phrase.
WRITE_SEED: Please carefully write down these 15 words or
CONFIRM_BACKUP_TEXT: Please, tap each word in the correct order or
MAX_TRANS_FEE_WARNING: This is the most amount of aero that might be used to process this transaction.
REGISTRATION_WARNING_TXT1: You should ONLY use the official Aerum client.
REGISTRATION_WARNING_TXT2: Seed Words is the only one way to recover access to your account, treat it with care.
REGISTRATION_WARNING_TXT3: Please be careful and never input your SEED into fake 'clients'. Otherwise your account will be compromised and you will lose all of your funds.
ACCESS_REC_HINT: Please provide your previously exported Seed Words or
KEY_PLACEHOLDER: Your seed is the 15 words you saved when creating your account
ERR_LOGIN_LOW: Your password should contain at least one lowercase letter.
ERR_LOGIN_UPP: Your password should contain at least one uppercase letter.
ERR_LOGIN_NUM: Your password should contain at least one number.
ERR_LOGIN_LENGHT: Your password must be at least 10 characters long.
ERR_LOGIN_NOTEQ: Your password and confirm password phrase does not match.
SHOWING_BLOCK: Showing Block (#{{lowestBlockNumber}} to #{{highestBlockNumber}}) out of {{blocksCount}} total blocks
TOTAL_OF_PENDING_TXNS: A total of {{transactionsCount}} Pending txns found
